nodes.text: Kkatamik was a Wookiee who sought to spread the ideals of Life Day.
For the Life Day festivities of 1 ABY, Kkatamik traveled to Anchorhead, Vreni Island and the island Varykino to teach spacers about Life Day.
He sent a number of spacers to visit Oraalarri on Endor and Yavin 4, so that they could learn more about the festival.

Kkatamik was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. During the Life Day event of 2004, players could talk to Kkatamik in either Anchorhead, Vreni Island or the Lake Retreat. Kkatamik would then send the player to visit a Wookiee family on either Endor or Yavin 4, where they could learn more about Life Day and receive a gift.
